tagline: Empowering students to excel in the world of technology

sections.subtitle: Who We Are
sections.description: Welcome to the Green University Computer Club (GUCC), a dynamic and student-driven organization in collaboration with the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at the Green University of Bangladesh. GUCC has over 7000+ members. Our goal is to empower CSE students and guide them on their path to successful careers in computer science and engineering.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to enhance the leadership and professional skills of CSE students at Green University of Bangladesh.

values.name: Community
values.description: Building a vibrant community of tech enthusiasts.

values.name: Excellence
values.description: Striving for excellence in all our endeavors.

events.title: Events
events.description: Organizing impactful events and workshops to foster learning and innovation.
